memberdef.type: typename GeomTraits::Line_2 or typename GeomTraits::Line_3 using Region_unordered_map=std::unordered_map< Item, std::size_t, internal::hash_item< Item > >
memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Segment_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, SegmentMap >::Primitive = typename GeomTraits::Line_2 or typename GeomTraits::Line_3 using Region_unordered_map = std::unordered_map<Item, std::size_t, internal::hash_item<Item> >
memberdef.name: Primitive

briefdescription.para: Primitive type depends on the dimension of the input data.

parameterdescription.para: a sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below
a model of ConstRange whose iterator type is RandomAccessIterator

listitem.para: the maximum distance from the furthest vertex of a segment to a line
the maximum angle in degrees between the direction of a segment and the direction of a line
the cosine value cos(maximum_angle * PI / 180) to be used instead of the parameter maximum_angle()
the minimum number of segments a region must have
an instance of SegmentMap that maps an item from input_range to Kernel::Segment_2 or Kernel::Segment_3

detaileddescription.para: This function creates an empty property map that maps iterators on the input range Item to std::size_t.
This function provides the last primitive that has been fitted with the region.

simplesect.para: Primitive parameters that fits the region

para.computeroutput: successful fitted primitive via successful call of update(region) with a sufficient large region

detaileddescription.para: This function controls if a segment with the index query is within the maximum_distance from the corresponding line and if the angle between the direction of this segment and the line's direction is within the maximum_angle. If both conditions are satisfied, it returns true, otherwise false.

query
Item of the query segment
The last parameter is not used in this implementation.
This function controls if the region contains at least minimum_region_size segments.

parameterdescription.para: Segments of the region represented as Items.

detaileddescription.para: This function fits the least squares line to all segments from the region.

parameterdescription.para: Segments of the region represented as Items.

simplesect.para: Boolean true if the line fitting succeeded and false otherwise

memberdef.type: typename std::conditional< std::is_same< typename GeomTraits::Segment_2, typename SegmentMap::value_type >::value, internal::Region_growing_traits_2< GeomTraits >, internal::Region_growing_traits_3< GeomTraits > >::type
memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Segment_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, SegmentMap >::Segment_set_traits = typename std::conditional< std::is_same<typename GeomTraits::Segment_2, typename SegmentMap::value_type>::value, internal::Region_growing_traits_2<GeomTraits>, internal::Region_growing_traits_3<GeomTraits> >::type
memberdef.name: Segment_set_traits

memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Segment_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, SegmentMap >::Point = typename Segment_set_traits::Point
memberdef.name: Point

memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Segment_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, SegmentMap >::Segment = typename Segment_set_traits::Segment
memberdef.name: Segment

memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Segment_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, SegmentMap >::Vector = typename Segment_set_traits::Vector
memberdef.name: Vector

memberdef.definition: using CGAL::Shape_detection::Segment_set::Least_squares_line_fit_region< GeomTraits, Item_, SegmentMap >::Line = typename Segment_set_traits::Line
memberdef.name: Line

briefdescription.para: Region type based on the quality of the least squares line fit applied to a segment set.

detaileddescription.para: This class fits a line, using PCA, to chunks of 2D or 3D segments and controls the quality of this fit. If all quality conditions are satisfied, the chunk is accepted as a valid region, otherwise rejected.

parameterdescription.para: a descriptor representing a given segment. Must be a model of Hashable.
a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is Item and value type is Kernel::Segment_2 or Kernel::Segment_3
